topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5372dbe86368726a9c010100#post_5372dbe86368726a9c010100
Here's some more good news;
*ONLY 34% of people living in the usa are opposed to legalizing same-sex marriage anymore*
I'll spare you the long explanation, but essentially opposition to legalization is dropping a percent a month; at this rate opposition will be more extinct than the dinosaurs by the time the next president takes office.

The glbt movement is just rubbing it in the anti-glbt movement's face right now gloating.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body: Does anyone have any ideas about how I can support biotechnology and how I can get other people to support it? I was thinking of starting a club.

topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5372e50f6368726ad0d20300#post_5372e50f6368726ad0d20300
[bq="SeraphimDawn"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5372e3d06368720447e60100#post_5372e3d06368720447e60100
Which states are still stubborn?[/bq]
No one really; even the deep south is turning over quickly.  The only group holding out is people over 50, but that's dropping like a rock as well.

I wouldn't go, "Oh those baby boomers" or "Oh those deep south states", because the thing is they've already lost.  By the time the next president takes office *EVEN LOUISIANA* will support gay marriage.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5372e6706368722d078e0600#post_5372e6706368722d078e0600
Fukkin A.

I actually take comfort in the knowledge that the anti gay sides are getting more extremist because extremism is the last gasp of dying modes of thought. When repression is accepted and common place there is simply no need for the extremists, they are just normal but as the old school is ground down and reexamined the people who are most terrified and entrenched come out of the wood work. It is my hope that within our lifetime we will see universal acceptance of LGBT people.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7

i mean its universally known america has a really big cultural(along with japan) influence in different types of countries, and with the gay marriage being legal more countries might be more willing to take a chance to listen.
